column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It was by no coincidence that a patronage was paid to the fine establishment known as Lou Malnati's.  For starters
column2: I am a New Yorker!  My experience with Pizza has solely been limited to that of Thin Crust and Sicilians.  The Deep Dish version of this delectable everyday eats
column3: was one for which I have yet the pleasure of indulging.  That is
